# RMS Truck Insurance

> Trucking insurance from people who actually get it.

## About Us

RMS Truck Insurance is a trucking-focused insurance agency serving owner-operators and small fleets across the United States. We specialize in commercial trucking insurance - understanding the unique needs of truckers because that's all we do.

- Founded: 2022
- Truckers helped: 2,000+
- Premium written: $14M+
- Phone: 208-800-0640

## What We Offer

- Commercial auto liability
- Physical damage coverage
- Motor truck cargo insurance
- Non-trucking liability (bobtail)
- Occupational accident coverage
- New authority startup packages
